DOC.brief_title: Comparison Different Bending Mode Double-lumen Endotracheal Tube Intubation
DOC.detailed_description: Intubation double-lumen endotracheal tube ( DLT ) remain great challenge anesthesiologist . Although new upper airway device , GlideScope ( R ) videolaryngoscope , develop facilitate airway management , large size complexity DLT single-lumen tube ( SLT ) make difficulty DLT intubation . Therefore , investigator design study investigate effect different bend type DLT tracheal intubation .
